original_title: Public Enemy: It Takes a Nation - The First London Invasion Tour 1987
overview: Recorded Live on November 1st, 2nd and 3rd, 1987 from Hammersmith Odeon London, as part of the European Def Jam Tour. With additional footage of Public Enemy on the streets of London.
title: Public Enemy: It Takes a Nation - The First London Invasion Tour 1987
